alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Franklin (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 23 at 8:30AM CDT until September 23 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Franklin County in east central Kansas... Southeastern Douglas County in east central Kansas... * Until 900 AM CDT. * At 829 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Baldwin City, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported half dollar size hail southwest of Baldwin City. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Baldwin City, Eudora, Wellsville and Vinland. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 193 and 198. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
